name: Survive (itch) (Skows Studios)
description:
Welcome to Survive!

This is an AI Survival chasing game, the player has to survive and face off against enemies for 5 minutes til the rescue squad arrives.

Background -

You've been placed on a mission to retrieve an ancient relic from an old village based in the deeps of the mountains of Asia.  This relic claims to have a mystic property to it according to the villagers, it brings judgement on those who hold it. 

When approaching the temple, you feel a strange and heavy aura flooding from within. The statue's gem calls you to take it. Calls you told it. You reach out to touch it and the guards catch you.

You grab it quickly and call for backup. The evacuation team will arrive in 5 minutes, you must survive until then!

Will you run or will you fight?

Controls -

E - Interact

Esc - Pause

L-Shift - Sprint

L-CTRL/C - Crouch

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Aim

R - Reload Weapon

Q - Fire Cracker Bomb

1 - Reload Cracker

X - Throwing Knives

2 - Reload Knives

Z - Gem ULT

NOTE: This is the very first shooter game :) 

DONATION: This game is 100% Free and developing games is expensive. So any amount of donation will really help us to improve and to fund our upcoming games. Thank you!
